abstract: HP reports quarterly revenue of $12.25 billion, almost 12 percent drop from quarter year earlier, when revenues was $13.86 billion.

headline.print_headline: HP Records a 12% Decrease in Quarterly Revenue

snippet: HP’s revenue fell to $12.25 billion, from $13.86 billion, as it struggles with weak demand for PCs and printers.
lead_paragraph: HP’s revenue fell to $12.25 billion, from $13.86 billion, as it struggles with weak demand for PCs and printers.
